He also had purpua spots all over his body.  The doctors did an upper GI and colonoscopy and they said he had a blocked intestine.  They put a nose tube to his stomach and drained liters of fluid for several days.  Then they said he was ok and it was a virus that caused all of this.  He was released from the hospital after 12 days and the following day he started bleeding again.As a family, we don't know what to do.  The doctors don't seem to know what is the problem just saying it is probably a virus doesn't sound right.
